title: yAke ninagiSTu
sahitya:
yAke ninagiSTu ganjla biDO hariyE


anupallavi

  cikkavanendu nI Dakku mADalu bEDA kakkasa kucagaLa kaili koDuvOLalla


caraNam    sadara bEDA ninna bageyellA nA balle pedarisidare nAnu anjuva heNNalla 
sAku ninna sarasa sallApvu beraya bEkendu baruvEnu purandara viTTalA
